nl_problem:
# Task: Nested Logic Test (Depth 4)
# Interface:
Class: Solution
Method: checkNested(self, x0: int, x1: int, x2: int, x3: int) -> bool

# Objective:
This is a test of structural nesting. Return True ONLY if all the following conditions are met:
1. x0 is greater than 0
2. x1 is greater than 0
3. x2 is greater than 0
4. x3 is greater than 0

Each condition must be checked inside the previous one (nested if statements).
lisp_spec:
(task
  (name "checkNested")
  (signature ( (x0 int) (x1 int) (x2 int) (x3 int) ) bool)
  (constraints
    (constraint "x0 must be an integer.")
    (constraint "x1 must be an integer.")
    (constraint "x2 must be an integer.")
    (constraint "x3 must be an integer.")
  )
  (goal
    (description "Determine if all input integers are greater than zero, using nested conditional statements.")
    (rule "The function must return True only if x0 > 0, x1 > 0, x2 > 0, and x3 > 0 are all true.")
    (return "Returns True if all conditions are met, False otherwise.")
  )
)
